sentences.sContent: Actually even so-called 'flashbulb memories'—like where you were when Kennedy was shot—can be quite inaccurate or easily change over time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Actually even so-called 'flashbulb memories'—like where you were when Kennedy was shot—can be quite inaccurate or easily change over time.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，即使是闪光灯记忆，就像你在肯尼迪被射杀的现场，也是非常不精确的，非常容易改变的。

words.tran: 闪光的；瞬间的；俗丽的；暴躁的
发出闪光之物；闪光装置

trans.tranOther: A flashbulb is a small bulb that can be attached to a camera. It makes a bright flash of light so that you can take photographs indoors.
